p:
The data from Exp. 1 and 2 were statistically analyzed by the proc mixed procedure of SAS 9.4 (SAS Institute Inc., Cary, NC USA), with the following model: Y
ijk = μ+ α
i + β
j + ε
ijk, where Y ijk, is the dependent variable; μ is the overall mean; α
i is the random effect of the fermentation run ( i = 1 to 3 in Exp. 1 and i = 1 to 2 in Exp. 2); β
j is the fixed effect of the dietary treatment ( j = 1 to 6 in Exp.1 and j = 1 to 4 in Exp. 2); and ε
ijk is the random error. The least square means were reported. For all of the statistical analyses, significance was declared at P ≤ 0.05 and trends at P ≤ 0.10.
